ui-error.description: This token is used on text and borders to indicate something went wrong or to bring attention to the user

Caption.description: Used for paragraphs and long text areas

Used in short labels like
- Input labels

Large Regular.description:
Used in short labels like
- Hint text
- Placeholders

Inline.description: Used to indicate a inline link inside a paragraph
